column4: what does this error message mean? - Value too large for defined data type
i'm only trying to copy a 40meg file
thats odd at least, is that the complete error?
try mv instead of cp (it won't delete it since ntfs is read only)
and if you cd into the folder that contains the file?
can you please ask on #ubuntu-devel or ubuntu-devel@lists.ubuntu.com, this looks like a really odd bug...
does it immediately say it or after copying a part of it?
i copied the files by scp'ing them from windows to my other *nix box - and then back in ubuntu copying them back
when's breezy supposed to be out? :P
i haven't got apt installed during the install, have i :/
of course you have otherwise you installed a different distro
